title: GOP Rep. John Katko, Who Voted to Impeach Trump, to Leave Congress
sub_head: New York lawmaker had worked with Democrats to try to establish bipartisan Jan. 6 commission
body:
Rep. John Katko, a moderate Republican who voted to impeach former President Donald Trump following the Jan. 6 riot at the Capitol, said he wouldnâ€™t seek another term in office.
The former federal prosecutor, who has served in Congress since 2015, cited a desire to spend more time with his family in announcing his retirement.
